duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform brownfield system upgrades and retrofits
Update existing documentation and coordinate utility routing with existing conditions through extensive field work
Produce mechanical and piping drawings from rough engineering sketches
Prepare illustrations, diagrams, graphs, charts, 3D renderings, or other appropriate graphic medium for various presentation media
Develop design documentation to support design intent
Support and provide technical direction on specific work assignments
Participate in the development and/or improvement of new and existing products for design change, cost reductions, warranty improvements and manufacturability
Conduct field walks and field verifications

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED (Bachelor's degree preferrable)
